message: Alright, so running this website is taking my time, energy and also my mind, and now I want to take a break to maintain this website because of my health (Anime will be keep updated from Kuronime). Also, I'm going to SELL this website, if you interested you can contact me on Telegram: https://t.me/mitsuaa for more information. || UPDATE: CDN cache now is alive, your stream will be served from Cloudflare Cache that will make your stream faster. || UPDATE: Infinite scrolling for Ongoing, Series, and Genre Page. Simplefield our backend with HonoJS for better memory management and better performance. || ToDo: Refactoring the front end, since our code is bit messy üòÅ
